volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'role': 'Board Member', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Svenska Landhockeyförbundet (Swedish Hockey Association)', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': 'In 2014 we started a journey and a mission, to spread field hockey in Sweden.

We founded the field hockey club MESAICOS and grew to become the biggest district of field hockey Sweden. Therefore, in 2019, me and three others of my club MESAICOS got the trust and support of many others to join the board of the Swedish Field Hockey Association: "Svenska Landhockeyförbundet".

Our journey continues here: through setting up a well-defined strategy, gathering the right people, identifying meaningful tasks and executing them, we together create the future of field hockey in Sweden!'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'role': 'Founding Board Member', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'S.L.F.
